title: my luck is op.
body:
today was i nice day out.  i decided to ride the bus downtown.  after a few hours i rode the bus back.  as soon as i got off the bus it starts raining.  so i get rained on for the 20 minute walk home.  once i get down the street from my house it stops raining.  

so basically, out of the whole day it only rained while i was walking home. gg.
